name: Pfizer
description: Pfizer Inc. is an American multinational pharmaceutical and biotechnology corporation headquartered in New York City. It is one of the world's largest pharmaceutical companies, focusing on research, development, and manufacturing of medicines and vaccines for a wide range of medical disciplines.

products.name: Exampla
products.description: A monoclonal antibody targeting inflammatory pathways.

products.name: CardioFix
products.description: A dual-action therapy for cardiovascular disease management.

products.name: OncoVax
products.description: Revolutionary oncology vaccine for prevention of recurrence.

milestones.title: COVID-19 Vaccine EUA
milestones.description: Received emergency use authorization for COVID-19 mRNA vaccine.

milestones.title: Upjohn - Mylan Merger
milestones.description: Announced merger of Upjohn division with Mylan to form Viatris.

milestones.title: Medivation Acquisition
milestones.description: Completed acquisition of Medivation for $14 billion.

name: Novartis
description: Novartis International AG is a Swiss multinational pharmaceutical company based in Basel, Switzerland. One of the largest pharmaceutical companies by revenue and market cap, Novartis develops, manufactures, and markets prescription and over-the-counter medications along with other healthcare products.

products.name: Luxient
products.description: Advanced targeted therapy for multiple sclerosis.

products.name: NeuroKem
products.description: Novel neuroprotective agent for neurodegenerative disorders.

milestones.title: AveXis Acquisition
milestones.description: Acquired AveXis for $8.7 billion, adding gene therapy capabilities.

milestones.title: Kymriah Approval
milestones.description: First CAR-T cell therapy approved for certain types of leukemia.

milestones.title: GSK Oncology Asset Acquisition
milestones.description: Acquired GlaxoSmithKline's oncology products for $16 billion.

name: AstraZeneca
description: AstraZeneca plc is a British-Swedish multinational pharmaceutical and biotechnology company with headquarters in Cambridge, England. AstraZeneca has a portfolio of products for major diseases in areas including oncology, cardiovascular, gastrointestinal, infection, neuroscience, and respiratory.

products.name: RespiClear
products.description: Next-generation inhaled therapy for severe asthma and COPD.

products.name: CardioStat
products.description: Novel anti-thrombotic medication for cardiovascular events prevention.

milestones.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Approval
milestones.description: Received UK approval for COVID-19 vaccine developed with Oxford University.

milestones.title: Biopharmaceuticals R&D Reorganization
milestones.description: Announced reorganization of R&D and creation of separate oncology unit.

milestones.title: ZS Pharma Acquisition
milestones.description: Acquired ZS Pharma for $2.7 billion, expanding cardiovascular and metabolic portfolio.
